mapper.select: SELECT device.title AS "title" , round(avg(tpc.cpu)) AS "value" FROM t_device device , t_perf_cpumem tpc WHERE device.deviceId = tpc.deviceId GROUP BY device.title ORDER BY avg(tpc.cpu) DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT model.title AS "title" , COUNT(*) AS "value" FROM t_device device , t_model model , t_errors terror WHERE device.modelId = model.modelId AND terror.deviceId = device.deviceId GROUP BY model.title ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT deviceId from t_device where title = #{deviceName}
SELECT title from t_device order by title;
SELECT td.title as `title` , COUNT(*) as `value` FROM t_device td , t_errors tr WHERE td.deviceId = tr.deviceId GROUP BY td.title ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 1
